import React, { useState } from "react"; import styles from "./Home.module.css"; const Home = () => { const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const openModal = () => setIsModalOpen(true); return (

Unlock the health impact of Air Quality with precision

BreatheSafetyIndex provides a data-driven assessment of health risks linked to outdoor air pollution and weather parameters, empowering businesses to make informed decisions on air quality impacts. Through advanced analytics and a robust API, our platform offers real-time and cumulative health risk evaluations, designed to seamlessly integrate into your applications.

{isModalOpen && (

Problem statement.With outdoor air pollution contributing to over 238,000 premature deaths in the EU alone, translating air quality data into meaningful health insights has become essential. Standard air quality measures offer limited guidance on the direct effects of pollution on human health, leaving a significant gap in understanding the specific risks associated with daily exposure to pollutants. BreatheSafetyIndex addresses this gap, empowering businesses and public health platforms with targeted health risk assessments based on environmental data. Our platform bridges the divide between raw pollution data and actionable, health-centered insights, aiding decision-making in industries where human safety and well-being are paramount.https://www.eea.europa.eu/en/topics/in-depth/air-pollution/eow-it-affects-our-health

)}
); }; export default Home;
